recipe.title: Cappuccino Date Slice
recipe.ingredients: 2 eggs 1 cup brown sugar 180 g butter, melted 1/2 cup milk 2 tablespoons coffee and chicory essence 1 C dates, pitted and chopped into small pieces 1 1/2 C flour ----Icing---- 2 C icing sugar 1 tablespoons coffee and chicory essence 25g butter, melted boiling water
recipe.steps: Preheat oven to 150C, spray a 20 x 30cm slice tin with non-stick baking spray and line the base with baking paper. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, add all the other ingredients and combine thoroughly. Spread into the prepared tin and bake for 50 mm Cool in the tin. When cold, spread with coffee icing. For the coffee icing, mix all the ingredients together, adding enough boiling water to form a smooth, glossy, spreadable icing. Cut when the icing has set.
